body_html:
@rakeshvar here is a vanilla-RNN example: https://nbviewer.jupyter.org/github/rdipietro/tensorflow-notebooks/blob/master/tensorflow_scan_examples/tensorflow_scan_examples.ipynb

(dynamic_rnn currently uses the lower-level While and TensorArray instead of the higher-level scan.)
body_text:
@rakeshvar here is a vanilla-RNN example: https://nbviewer.jupyter.org/github/rdipietro/tensorflow-notebooks/blob/master/tensorflow_scan_examples/tensorflow_scan_examples.ipynb
(dynamic_rnn currently uses the lower-level While and TensorArray instead of the higher-level scan.)
body:
@rakeshvar here is a vanilla-RNN example: https://nbviewer.jupyter.org/github/rdipietro/tensorflow-notebooks/blob/master/tensorflow_scan_examples/tensorflow_scan_examples.ipynb

(`dynamic_rnn` currently uses the lower-level `While` and `TensorArray` instead of the higher-level `scan`.)
